list.name: Default
list.comment: app can be opened and tested without tasker, has icon and all, updated for Q

task.summary: Modified and improved a lot of little but no significant things
Changed closing the connection from stream.write(" exit" + '\n') to the simpler stream.close() Removed responses after exit Added a way to see if the adb connection couldn't close
Correctly added library for adb encryption
rebuilt sendsinglecommand to push a ctrl+c before each command
added timeout and error logging for tasker
added timeout and error logging for tasker
updated kotlin, gradle and fixed layout for smaller screens
app can be opened and tested without tasker, has icon and all, updated for Q
